entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Matagami
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:29 PM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Sunny, -21.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Matagami Airport 4:00 PM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023
Condition: Sunny
Temperature: -21.4°C
Pressure: 102.9 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 56 %
Wind Chill: -31
Dewpoint: -27.8°C
Wind: N 17 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday night: Clear. Low minus 34.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 34. Wind chill minus 27 this evening and minus 44 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 21.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness in the morning. Wind becoming north 20 km/h near noon. High minus 21. Wind chill minus 44 in the morning and minus 32 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 32.
